select r.id, r.name, r.role_key, r.description, r.status, r.create_time, r.update_time from sys_role r
and r.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and r.role_key like concat('%',#{roleKey},'%')
and r.description like concat('%',#{description},'%')
and r.status = #{status}
select r.id, r.name, r.role_key, r.description, r.status, r.create_time, r.update_time from sys_role r inner join sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
